description: Detects a rundll32 that communicates with public IP addresses
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Communication to other corporate systems that use IP addresses from public address spaces
name: Rundll32 Internet Connection
query: ((process.executable.text:*\\rundll32.exe AND winlog.event_data.Initiated:"true") AND (NOT ((((destination.ip:(10.* OR 192.168.* OR 172.16.* OR 172.17.* OR 172.18.* OR 172.19.* OR 172.20.* OR 172.21.* OR 172.22.* OR 172.23.* OR 172.24.* OR 172.25.* OR 172.26.* OR 172.27.* OR 172.28.* OR 172.29.* OR 172.30.* OR 172.31.* OR 127.* OR 20.* OR 51.103.* OR 51.104.* OR 51.105.*)) OR (process.command_line.text:*PcaSvc.dll,PcaPatchSdbTask*) OR (source.domain:*.internal.cloudapp.net))) OR ((process.parent.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\svchost.exe" AND destination.port:"443")))))
